name: Button Clicker Duck Kicker
description:
Hello everyone! 

First of all please let  me introduce myself. 

My name is Javier Cordero, and I'm a Spanish university student,  currently studying videogames development in my last year.

Why I did this game? The truth is that I just did this game because I need the money to  start developing a bigger project that right now I can't afford.

That's why I made it on a weekend and that's the reason why it has some ads on it.

You may be wondering why I didn't upload it to playstore and why I just give an apk that doesn't look trustable. Well, the reason is that I just can't affor the google play payment to upload it and it takes many time to set everything up on google play. 

I know it's not best game of the year not even best game of the week, but just playing it and watching some little ads you help me getting the money I need to develop my next big project. (Donations are avaliable too) (VR-experience project)

I also have my webpage ( https://javiercordero.github.io/Videogames/ ) just if you want to see what kind of games I develop and if you want to try any of them for free.

Thank you so much for your time and your help and hope you like the game even a bit. 

Javier Cordero.
